name: Backyard Sports: Rookie Rush
description:
Back of Case - Nintendo DS (US) (from Ad Blurbs)

ROCK THE FIELD

It’s time for kick off! Team up with the coolest and craziest kids ever to play football. Choose from a variety of playing options – including a super-charged Story Mode, or take on all teams in Season Playoff Mode and become the Ultimate Backyard Champion!

(screenshot captions)
  • 9 All-New Fields
  • Explosive Power-Ups
